Services.description: Quality hardware, unbeatable prices, and a shopping experience designed for the modern era.

highQuality.title: High Quality Standards
highQuality.desc: We refuse to compromise. Every product in our catalog is vetted for durability and professional-grade performance.

lowPrice.title: Always Low Price
lowPrice.desc: Direct importer status allows us to cut out middlemen and pass the savings directly to you. Fair pricing, guaranteed.

expert.title: Expert Consultation
expert.desc: Not sure what you need? Our veteran team provides free technical advice to ensure your project succeeds.

Services.waitlist: We are building the most advanced hardware e-commerce platform in Myanmar. Join the waitlist for exclusive early access and launch discounts.

VisionMission.desc: Redefining the standards of hardware and home improvement through innovation, quality, and sustainable practices.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To be the premier destination for high-quality hardware and home improvement solutions in Myanmar, recognized for our commitment to innovation, sustainability, and customer excellence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Provide a comprehensive range of genuine, durable products.
mission.p2: Offer expert advice and exceptional service to every customer.
mission.p3: Contribute to the modernization of Myanmar's infrastructure.

Testimonials.title: Trusted by Professionals & Homeowners
Testimonials.desc: Don't just take our word for it. Here is what our community has to say about their experience with ThuRain.
Testimonials.t1: The quality of the hardware tools I bought was exceptional. Delivery was fast and the packaging was secure. Highly recommended!
Testimonials.t2: I source most of my decor items from ThuRain. Their collection is unique and modern, perfect for my clients.
Testimonials.t3: Reliable service and great prices. The bulk ordering process is smooth and the team is very responsive.
Testimonials.t4: Love the variety of products! Found everything I needed for my weekend renovation project.

FAQ.title: Frequently
FAQ.desc: Everything you need to know about our products, services, and ordering process.

q1.q: Do you offer bulk pricing for contractors?
q1.a: Absolutely! We provide competitive bulk pricing for contractors, builders, and project managers. Contact us directly via WhatsApp or visit our showroom to discuss your project requirements and get a custom quote tailored to your needs.

q2.q: Are your products genuine and warranty-covered?
q2.a: Yes, every product in our catalog is 100% genuine and sourced directly from authorized manufacturers and distributors. Most products come with the manufacturer's original warranty. We never stock counterfeit or substandard goods.

q3.q: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.a: We accept cash payments at our showroom, bank transfers (KBZ, AYA, CB), and mobile payments including KBZ Pay and Wave Money. For bulk orders, we also offer flexible payment arrangements.

q4.a: We are currently preparing our delivery network to serve you better. For now, pickup is available at both our Thamine and Kyimyindaing branches. For large orders, we can help arrange third-party logistics at competitive rates.

q5.q: Can I get expert advice on which products to choose?
q5.a: Of course! Our experienced team offers free technical consultation for any project — from home renovations to large-scale construction. Just visit our showroom or reach out on WhatsApp, and we will guide you to the right products.

q6.q: When will the online store be available?
q6.a: Our online e-commerce platform is currently in development and expected to launch soon. Join our waitlist to get early access, exclusive launch discounts, and priority notifications when we go live.

hero.desc: Welcome to ThuRain Store — your number one source for all things hardware and home decoration. We're dedicated to giving you the very best of home accessories, plumbing, and appliances, with a focus on quality, customer service, and uniqueness.

story.heading: Our Story
story.quote: Our passion for high‑quality, reliable home improvement products drove us to do intense research so that we can offer you the world's most advanced home solutions.
story.p1: Founded in Myanmar, ThuRain Store has come a long way from its beginnings. When we first started out, our passion for high-quality, reliable home improvement products drove us to do intense research so that ThuRain Store can offer you the world's most advanced home solutions. We now serve customers all over the country and are thrilled that we're able to turn our passion into our own website.
story.p2: We hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy offering them to you. If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact us.

v1.title: Quality First
v1.desc: Every product in our store is carefully selected and inspected. We only offer premium-grade materials that meet our high standards — no compromise.

v2.title: Fair Pricing
v2.desc: We believe quality shouldn't break the bank. Our wholesale connections and direct sourcing allow us to pass genuine savings to every customer.

v3.title: Expert Support
v3.desc: Our experienced team is here to help — from choosing the right fittings to technical guidance on materials. Your project is our priority.
